Question: Dongguan Arin Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Arin Electronics Technology Co., Ltd

Product: USB 4 Cables

- Certification: USB4 Gen2, USB 5Gbps 240W
- Material: PVC, AL-Alloy, Silica gel, TPE, TPU
- Length: 1M/2M/Customize
- Support 8K and max 240W charging

Product: Displayport 2.1 Cables

- OEM compatible transceivers products
- High-speed network cable: AOC&DAC InfiniBand, Fiber & Copper patch cables
- Custom coding solutions
- 10Gbps-800Gbps
- TAA compliant solutions
- Compatible solutions for 50+ various OEM platforms
- True code programming for identical OEM functionality
- Free evaluation units
- Lifetime warranty
